summary:
UFC is the world's biggest mixed martial arts (MMA) company, based in Las Vegas. It started in 1993 with the goal of finding the best martial art. Over time, it evolved into a global sport with strict rules and different weight classes for men and women.

The company has changed owners a few times. It's now part of TKO Group Holdings, owned by Endeavor Group. Dana White has been the president since 2001 and helped make UFC a successful, billion-dollar business. Recently, UFC merged with WWE to create an even bigger entertainment company.
title: Ultimate Fighting Championship
